item.title: 英特尔遭股东起诉，指控其证券欺诈
item.description: 英特尔周三遭到股东起诉，称其欺诈性地隐瞒了导致第二季度业绩疲软的问题，促使这家硅谷芯片制造商暂停派息，并计划裁员 15%。【原文：Intel was sued on Wednesday by shareholders who said it fraudulently concealed problems that led to weak second-quarter results, and prompted the Silicon Valley chipmaker to suspend its dividend and to plan cutting its workforce by 15%.】

item.title: 西方石油公司第二季度利润增长
item.description: 西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum）周三报告称，由于石油产量和原油价格上升，该公司第二季度利润有所增长。【原文：Occidental Petroleum reported a rise in second-quarter profit on Wednesday, as the oil and gas firm benefited from higher oil production and crude prices.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 上调年度收入预期
item.description: Beyond Meat 周三上调了全年营收预期，因其植物肉类产品在通胀压力下连续涨价而受益，股价盘后上涨 16%。【原文：Beyond Meat raised its forecast for annual revenue on Wednesday, as it benefits from a string of price hikes on its plant-based meat products amid sticky inflation, sending its shares up 16% after the bell.】

item.title: 美国企业债券发行量在短暂回落后跳升
item.description: 本周早些时候，由于借贷成本飙升，美国企业借款人对新债券的销售持观望态度，而本周三则涌入市场。【原文：U.S. corporate borrowers flooded the market for new bond sales on Wednesday after sitting on the sidelines earlier in the week due to a spike in borrowing costs.】

item.title: Bumble 预测第三季度营收低于预期，股价下滑
item.description: 本周三，Bumble 预测第三季度营收低于华尔街预期，这表明用户在其约会应用上的自由支配支出疲软。【原文：Bumble forecast third-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, signaling sluggish discretionary spending by users on its dating apps.】

item.title: 股票和加密货币交易强劲，Robinhood 第二季度收入大增
item.description: 受股票和加密货币交易强劲的推动，Robinhood 公布第二季度营收激增，盘后股价上涨 2%。【原文：Robinhood reported a surge in second-quarter revenue, boosted by strong trading in equities and cryptocurrencies, sending shares up 2% after the bell.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）因制片厂不景气，季度收入不及预期
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周三计提了 91 亿美元的商誉减值费用，季度营收不及华尔街预期，受电影公司业绩下滑的影响，该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌了 7.8%。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery recorded a $9.1 billion goodwill impairment charge and missed Wall Street expectations for quarterly revenue on Wednesday, hurt by a studio slump, sending its shares lower 7.8% in trading after the bell.】

item.title: NTSB 将对波音 737 MAX 工厂工人进行安全文化调查
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会主席周三表示，该委员会计划对波音公司位于华盛顿州伦顿的 737 MAX 工厂的员工进行一次安全文化调查。【原文：The National Transportation Safety Board plans to conduct a safety culture survey of employees at Boeing's 737 MAX factory in Renton, Washington, the board's chair said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 达美航空乘客起诉航空公司在电脑故障后拒绝退款
item.description: 达美航空公司被乘客告上法庭，乘客投诉该航空公司在上个月发生大规模计算机故障后，在推迟或取消航班后拒绝全额退款。【原文：Delta Air Lines was sued by passengers who complained that the carrier refused to offer full refunds after delaying or canceling their flights in the wake of last month's massive computer outage.】

item.title: 消息人士称，大麻生产商 Demecan 在获得新资金后估值接近 1 亿欧元
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周三告诉路透社，德国最大的大麻生产商之一德梅肯集团（Demecan Group）最近完成了最新一轮融资，使其估值接近 1 亿欧元（1.0924 亿美元）。【原文：Demecan Group, one of Germany's largest cannabis producers, recently completed its latest round of funding, bringing its valuation close to 100 million euros ($109.24 million), a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 现金流前景乐观，人工智能推动流明科技股价继续大涨
item.description: 由于与人工智能相关的需求，这家电信公司上调了年度自由现金流预期，Lumen Technologies 的股价周三大涨 30%，延续了上一交易日的涨势。【原文：Shares of Lumen Technologies surged 30% on Wednesday, extending gains from the previous session, after the telecommunications company boosted its annual free-cash-flow forecast due to demand related to artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 股市暴跌后，交易员因大幅波动性空头损失数十亿美元
item.description: 在全球股市大跌之后，一个关于股市将保持平静的赌注让散户交易员、对冲基金和养老基金损失了数十亿美元，这凸显了扎堆下流行赌注的风险。【原文：A wager that stock markets would stay calm has cost retail traders, hedge funds and pension funds billions after a selloff in global stocks, highlighting the risks of piling into a popular bet.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，必和必拓正在酝酿出售巴西的金矿和铜矿
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，据熟悉内情的人士透露，世界顶级矿商必和必拓集团（BHP Group）正在酝酿出售巴西铜金资产，这是该公司收购规模较小的同行奥兹矿业公司（Oz Minerals）的一部分。【原文：BHP Group , the world's top miner, is mulling a sale of Brazilian copper and gold assets it took over as part of the buyout of smaller peer Oz Minerals, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波音公司称，随着 "爱国者 "战斗机的需求激增，它正在提高寻的器的产量
item.description: 波音公司周三表示，该公司一直在加紧生产PAC-3寻的器--"爱国者 "拦截器使用的关键部件--以满足导弹防御系统激增的需求。【原文：Boeing on Wednesday said it has been ramping up its production of PAC-3 seekers - critical components used in Patriot interceptors - to meet the surge in demand for the missile defense system.】

item.title: 本周市场暴跌，交易者唾弃零时差期权
item.description: 数据显示，在本周早些时候美股暴跌期间，投资者避开了趋势性的短期限股票期权，转而寻求较长期限合约的保护，这暴露了所谓的 0DTE 期权在防范市场持续震荡方面的局限性。【原文：Investors avoided trendy short-dated equity options and looked to longer-tenor contracts for protection during a meltdown in U.S. stock earlier this week, exposing the limitations of so-called 0DTE options in guarding against sustained market gyrations, data showed.】

item.title: 夏季奥运会带动网站访问量和销售额，耐克迎来淘金热
item.description: 研究公司 Similarweb 的网站搜索结果显示，夏季奥运会成为耐克公司难得的赢家，因为这一全球体育盛事帮助提升了对这家运动服装巨头新推出产品的需求，并使其在竞争中处于优势地位。【原文：The summer Olympics is turning out to be a rare win for Nike as the global sporting event has helped boost demand for the sportswear giant's new launches and edge out competition, website searches from research firm Similarweb showed.】

item.title: 克罗格公司驳回 "农场新鲜 "鸡蛋诉讼案胜诉
item.description: 美国最大的食品杂货商之一克罗格公司（Kroger）赢得了一项诉讼的撤诉，该诉讼称克罗格公司误导消费者，使用人们熟悉的 "农场新鲜 "标签来描述来自工业化环境中笼养母鸡的鸡蛋。【原文：Kroger , one of the largest U.S. grocers, won the dismissal of a lawsuit claiming it misled consumers by using the familiar "farm fresh" label to describe eggs that came from caged hens in industrial settings.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率因就业数据疲软和美联储降息信号而下降
item.description: 上周，美国最受欢迎的住房贷款利率骤降至 15 个月以来的最低水平，此前美联储表示可能在 9 月份开始下调政策利率，而就业市场的下行也支撑了金融市场对借贷成本大幅下降的押注。【原文：The interest rate for the most popular U.S. home loan plunged last week to its lowest level in 15 months, after the Federal Reserve signaled it could start cutting its policy rate in September and a downshift in the job market bolstered financial market bets the reductions in borrowing costs would be big.】

item.title: 迪士尼可能需要为康卡斯特持有的 Hulu 股份多支付 50 亿美元
item.description: 华特-迪士尼周三表示，如果评估师同意康卡斯特的评估，认为 Hulu 少数股权的估值应超过 400 亿美元，那么迪士尼可能需要再支付多达 50 亿美元才能收购康卡斯特持有的 Hulu 少数股权。【原文：Walt Disney said on Wednesday it may have to pay up to $5 billion more to buy Comcast's minority stake in Hulu, if an appraiser were to agree with Comcast's assessment that the stake should be valued at more than $40 billion.】

item.title: 西门子董事长斯纳布连任两年
item.description: 西门子监事会主席吉姆-哈格曼-斯纳布（Jim Hagemann Snabe）周三在一份声明中表示，西门子监事会主席将在今年 2 月举行的年度股东大会上再次当选，任期两年。【原文：Siemens' supervisory board head Jim Hagemann Snabe will be elected for additional two years in his role at the annual general meeting in February, the German conglomerate said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 马斯克挑起英国分歧，引发加快推出网络安全法律的呼声
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）被指责在英国一周的极右翼骚乱后加剧了紧张局势，引发了要求政府加快推出监管有害网络内容的法律的呼声。【原文：Elon Musk has been accused of exacerbating tensions after a week of far-right rioting in Britain, sparking calls for the government to speed up the rollout of laws policing harmful online content.】

item.title: 10 年期债券拍卖疲软，企业供应量大，收益率上升
item.description: 周三，美国财政部出售 420 亿美元 10 年期国债的需求疲软，而且随着风险偏好的改善，公司急于出售债务，美国国债收益率上升。【原文：U.S. Treasury yields rose on Wednesday after the Treasury Department saw soft demand for a $42 billion sale of 10-year notes and as companies rushed to sell debt as risk appetite improved.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美国消费者监督机构就 Zelle 骗局对美国各大银行进行调查
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，美国消费者金融保护局（CFPB）正在调查美国各大银行对点对点支付平台 Zelle 上客户资金的处理情况。【原文：The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) is investigating major U.S. banks for their handling of customer funds on the peer-to-peer payments platform Zelle, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Equity Residential 将以近 10 亿美元从 Blackstone 收购公寓投资组合
item.description: Equity Residential 已同意以约 9.64 亿美元的价格从 Blackstone 收购 11 处公寓物业。【原文：Equity Residential has agreed to acquire 11 apartment properties from Blackstone for about $964 million, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Instacart 因强劲的食品配送需求和广告业务增长而股价大涨
item.description: Instacart 股价在周三的盘前交易中上涨超过 10%，原因是杂货配送需求强劲，广告业务也出现了可喜的增长迹象，这有助于该公司预测本季度业绩向好。【原文：Shares of Instacart rose more than 10% in premarket trading on Wednesday as strong demand for grocery delivery and promising signs of growth in its advertising business helped the company forecast an upbeat current quarter.】

item.title: 诺和诺德公司称，美国患者服用伟哥维肥胖症药物 "约六个月
item.description: 诺和诺德公司的一位高管周三表示，美国患者服用该公司生产的Wegovy减肥药的时间 "约为6个月"。【原文：U.S. patients are staying on Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight-loss medication for "around six months", an executive said on Wednesday, adding that the company is confident that over time as shortages ease that will increase to 12 months.】

item.title: 拉尔夫-劳伦（Ralph Lauren）盈利超预期，因欧洲和中国需求稳定
item.description: 拉尔夫-劳伦公司（Ralph Lauren Corp）第一季度利润超出预期，原因是欧洲和中国市场对其价格昂贵的牛仔裤和马球衫的稳定需求抵消了美国市场销售的放缓，使其股价在周三盘前上涨了 4%。【原文：Ralph Lauren Corp beat first-quarter profit estimates as steady demand for its pricey denims and polo shirts in Europe and China offset slower sales in the U.S., sending its shares up 4% premarket on Wednesday.】

item.title: Emerson 因测量仪器需求增长而实现季度盈利
item.description: 艾默生电气周三公布的第三季度财报显示，该公司生产阀门、调节器和执行器的部门第三季度盈利增加，主要得益于市场对这些产品的需求。【原文：Emerson Electric reported higher third-quarter earnings on Wednesday, aided by demand for its unit which makes valves, regulators and actuators.】

item.title: 医疗器械需求强劲，Zimmer Biomet 盈利超出预期
item.description: Zimmer Biomet 控股公司周三公布的第二季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是市场对其用于关节重建手术的设备需求强劲。【原文：Zimmer Biomet Holdings beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by robust demand for its devices used in joint reconstruction procedures.】

item.title: 美国汽车监管机构对超过 77,000 辆日产 SUV 展开调查
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周三表示，已开始对77,131辆日产汽车的转向拉杆问题进行初步评估。【原文：U.S. auto safety regulator has opened a preliminary evaluation into 77,131 Nissan vehicles over reports of an issue with the steering tie rod, it said on Wednesday.】
